info.description: Customer control panel API for web hosting management
info.title: Control Panel API

post.description: Authenticate with email and password to receive a JWT token
Triggers a restore from a backup
Disables a cron job to stop it from running
Enables a cron job to start running on schedule

get.description: Returns all customers the authenticated user has access to
Fetches backups across all tenants the customer has subscriptions with the "backups" module

post.description: Triggers a new backup for a tenant resolved from the subscription_id in the body

get.description: Fetches databases across all tenants the customer has subscriptions with the "databases" module
Fetches all DNS zones and filters to those belonging to tenants the customer has access to
Fetches email accounts across all tenants the customer has subscriptions with the "email" module
Fetches S3 buckets across all tenants the customer has subscriptions with the "s3" module
Fetches SSH keys across all tenants the customer has subscriptions with the "ssh_keys" module

post.description: Creates an SSH key for a tenant resolved from the subscription_id in the body

get.description: Fetches Valkey instances across all tenants the customer has subscriptions with the "valkey" module
Fetches webroots across all tenants the customer has access to
Returns subscriptions and enabled modules for a customer

post.description: Disables a daemon to stop it from running
Enables a daemon to start running

get.description: Returns a single database by ID, with authorization check
Returns all access rules for a database

post.description: Creates an access rule for a database

delete.description: Deletes an access rule for a database

get.description: Returns all users for a database

post.description: Creates a user for a database

get.description: Returns a single DNS zone by ID, with authorization check

delete.description: Removes a DNS zone by ID

get.description: Returns all records for a DNS zone

post.description: Creates a new record in a DNS zone

put.description: Updates a record in a DNS zone

delete.description: Deletes a record from a DNS zone

get.description: Returns a single email account by ID, with authorization check

delete.description: Removes an email account by ID

get.description: Returns all aliases for an email account

post.description: Creates an alias for an email account

delete.description: Deletes an alias for an email account

get.description: Returns the autoreply for an email account

put.description: Sets the autoreply for an email account

delete.description: Deletes the autoreply for an email account

get.description: Returns all forwards for an email account

post.description: Creates a forward for an email account

delete.description: Deletes a forward for an email account

get.description: Returns the profile of the currently authenticated user

patch.description: Update locale, display name, or last selected customer for the current user

get.description: Returns a single S3 bucket by ID, with authorization check

delete.description: Removes an S3 bucket by ID

get.description: Returns all access keys for an S3 bucket

post.description: Creates an access key for an S3 bucket

delete.description: Deletes an access key for an S3 bucket
Removes an SSH key by ID

get.description: Returns a single Valkey instance by ID, with authorization check

delete.description: Removes a Valkey instance by ID

get.description: Returns all users for a Valkey instance

post.description: Creates a user for a Valkey instance

get.description: Returns a single webroot by ID

put.description: Modifies a webroot's runtime, runtime version, and public folder

get.description: Returns all tenant FQDNs not currently attached to any webroot
Returns all cron jobs for a webroot

post.description: Creates a new cron job for a webroot

get.description: Returns all daemons for a webroot

post.description: Creates a new daemon for a webroot

get.description: Returns all environment variables for a webroot

put.description: Replaces all environment variables for a webroot

delete.description: Removes a single environment variable by name

get.description: Returns all hostnames attached to a webroot

post.description: Attaches a hostname to a webroot by setting its webroot_id
Removes a hostname from a webroot by clearing its webroot_id

get.description: Returns available runtimes for a webroot's region, grouped by runtime type

post.description: Decrypts a vault token and returns the plaintext value
Encrypts a plaintext value and returns a vault token for use in env vars
